attributes.action: Give All NetWorking Sites, The Panic Button!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According what's been mentioned in papers....It turns out that both Facebook and Myspace have turned down the offer to use a panic button for children, if they're getting bullied etc. 

And the only networking site, that has accepted the offer is Bebo. But it should really be all of them.

So, if we get enough people to sign this petition....Then maybe other networking sites, will start using the button.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
